name: A.I.L.A
summary: A.I.L.A is a first-person horror game developed by Pulsatrix Studios in partnership with MaxMRM, where you are a beta tester responsible for creating, based on choices made by the player through a prompt, and testing horror games generated by the artificial intelligence. Each time a new game starts, new challenges, interactions, and revelations present themselves to the player while trying to find ways to unlock the secrets of A.I.L.A and use them against her.
